snippet: A man who took a shopper hostage at the Woodbridge Center mall in New Jersey on Thursday was shot and killed inside a store, authorities said.
abstract: Man who took a shopper hostage at the Woodbridge Center mall in New Jersey after he was accused of shoplifting is shot and killed by a police offer inside a store; names are not released.
lead_paragraph: A man who took a shopper hostage at the Woodbridge Center mall in New Jersey on Thursday was shot and killed inside a store, authorities said.

headline.seo: Officer Kills Hostage-Taker at a Woodbridge Mall
headline.main: Officer at Mall Kills Man Holding Knife
headline.print_headline: Officer at Mall Kills Man Holding Knife
